Garden Edging Solutions

Specializing in high-quality Corten steel edging for DIY supply or professional installation.

Supply Only

Premium Corten steel garden edging strips and rings. Available in various heights (100mm, 150mm) and lengths. Perfect for DIY projects.

Get Quote →

Supply & Install

Full service installation. We prepare the ground, shape the edging to your design, and install with commercial grade pegs for longevity.

Custom Curved Edging

Specialist onsite curving. We create flowing, organic lines that define your garden beds. No pre-formed rings, just perfect custom curves.

Technical Specifications

Designed for the Coast

Why Corten Steel is the superior choice for Mornington Peninsula gardens.

Salt Spray Resistance

Unlike mild steel which rots in coastal air, Corten develops a stable rust-like appearance. This patina acts as a protective coating, preventing further corrosion and making it perfect for Bayside and Peninsula homes.

Native Garden Synergy

The earthy, ochre tones of rusted steel provide a stunning contrast to the silver-greens of Coastal Rosemary, Banksias, and native grasses found throughout our region.

Zero Maintenance

Once installed, Corten edging requires no painting, oiling, or intricate care. It simply gets better with age, blending seamlessly into the landscape.

Common Questions

Where do you service?

We service the entire Mornington Peninsula and Bayside areas, from Frankston down to Portsea, and across to Western Port (Balnarring, Flinders).

Do you supply to the public?

Yes. We offer "Supply Only" packages for DIY enthusiasts. We can deliver the steel strips, pegs, and joiners directly to your door.

How deep does the edging go?

Standard edging is 100mm or 150mm high. We verify your soil depth before installation. Approximately 1/3 of the edge is usually buried for stability, but this varies by design.

Can it be used for retaining?

It is primarily for separation, but can retain small heights (up to 200mm). For higher retaining walls, we recommend heavier gauge steel or different engineering.
